original: Holm, Thorbjörn Fredrik, direktör, Hovås, f. 4/4/87 i Gbg av konsul Johan Frederik Sörensen H. o. Augusta Wilhelmina Carlsson. G. 1. 13 m. Harriet Wiklund; 2. 37 m. Kirsten Dige. Barn: Bertil f. 14, disp. i A-B J. A. Wetter-gren & Co., Gbg, Ingrid 16, g. m. köpm. Lars Gedda, Gbg, Ulla 18, g. m. skeppsred. Dan Axel Bro-ström, Gbg. — Genomg. Lundsbergs sk., CTH (1. avd.). Stud. i Tyskl., Engl. o. Frankr. Verkst. dir. i A-B J. A. Wettergren & Co. i Gbg. Led. av ’sityr. f. Konfek-tioms A-B Cointinental, A-B Jawe, Wettergren verken A-B, A-B Holma-ren, A-B Dress, A-B Sv. Pälsvarufabr., Konfektionsfabr. Norge A/S, Gbgs konfektions- o. manufakt :engross. o. konfektionsind iföiren. RVOIM.
translated: Holm, Thorbjörn Fredrik, director, Hovås, born April 4, 1887 in Gothenburg to consul Johan Frederik Sörensen H. and Augusta Wilhelmina Carlsson. Married 1st for 13 years to Harriet Wiklund; 2nd for 37 years to Kirsten Dige. Children: Bertil, born 1914, employee at A-B J. A. Wettergren & Co., Gothenburg; Ingrid, born 1916, married to merchant Lars Gedda, Gothenburg; Ulla, born 1918, married to ship-owner Dan Axel Broström, Gothenburg. Thorbjörn Fredrik attended Lundsbergs boarding school and studied in Germany, England, and France. He worked as a managing director at A-B J. A. Wettergren & Co. in Gothenburg. He was a member of several boards, including those of Confectionery A-B Cointinental, A-B Jawe, Wettergren Works A-B, A-B Holmaren, A-B Dress, A-B Sv. Pälsvarufabr., Konfektionsfabr. Norge A/S, Gothenburg's confectionery and wholesale and clothing industry. He was awarded the RVOIM.
